remarks: The outer product of two vectors, expressed as ` | A >. ` ` <. B | ` in Dirac notation, is an operator.  (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: kbop $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( A ketbra B ) : ~H --> ~H ) $.
